_comment: Configuration for filtering and displaying scripts on the blog - updated for manifest generation

descriptions.README.md: Complete documentation, installation guide, and educational resources. Start here to understand the project structure, safety practices, and how to use these scripts effectively.
descriptions.brew_setup_tahoe.sh: Educational Homebrew installer with interactive setup, dry-run mode, and comprehensive safety features. Perfect for learning shell scripting while automating macOS setup.
descriptions.install-essential-apps.sh: Batch installer for essential macOS applications using Homebrew. Installs productivity, development, and utility apps automatically.
descriptions.setup-auto-update.sh: Configures automatic Homebrew updates with text notifications. Sets up scheduled maintenance using macOS launchd.
descriptions.setup-hybrid-notifications.sh: Advanced notification setup supporting both email and SMS alerts for system updates and maintenance tasks.
descriptions.auto-update-brew.sh: Basic automatic Homebrew updater with text notifications. Runs scheduled updates and sends status reports.
descriptions.auto-update-brew-hybrid.sh: Advanced automatic updater with email and SMS notifications. Includes detailed reporting and error handling.
descriptions.cleanup-homebrew.sh: Comprehensive Homebrew maintenance script. Removes old packages, clears caches, and optimizes disk usage.
